question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. red bus
B. no entry sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The no entry sign is positioned further back under the overpass, while the red bus is closer to the foreground, making the depth relationship visually clear without needing a depth map.
